description.0: A strangely-shaped anthology of scripts. All the scripts written by Coppelius are recorded within.

0.0: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide <cryo>2%</cryo> All Elemental DMG Bonus, up to a maximum of <cryo>12%</cryo>. This effect lasts 15s.
